id.description: The unique identifier of the channel.

is_channel.description: Indicates if the entity is a channel.

is_group.description: Indicates if the channel is a group (private channel) rather than a regular channel.

is_im.description: Indicates if the entity is a direct message (IM) channel.

context_team_id.description: The unique identifier of the team context in which the channel exists.

created.description: The timestamp when the channel was created.

creator.description: The ID of the user who created the channel.

is_archived.description: Indicates if the channel is archived.

is_general.description: Indicates if the channel is a general channel in the workspace.

unlinked.description: Indicates if the channel is unlinked.

updated.description: The timestamp when the channel was last updated.

name_normalized.description: The normalized name of the channel.

is_read_only.description: Indicates if the channel is read-only.

is_shared.description: Indicates if the channel is shared.

is_ext_shared.description: Indicates if the channel is externally shared.

is_org_shared.description: Indicates if the channel is organization-wide shared.

pending_shared.description: The list of pending shared items of the channel.

is_pending_ext_shared.description: Indicates if the channel is pending external shared.

is_member.description: Indicates if the calling user is a member of the channel.

is_private.description: Indicates if the channel is a private channel.

is_mpim.description: Indicates if the entity is a multiple person direct message (MPIM) channel.

last_read.description: The timestamp of the user's last read message in the channel.

value.description: The value of the channel topic.

creator.description: The ID of the user who last set the topic.

last_set.description: The timestamp when the topic was last set.

value.description: The value of the channel purpose.

creator.description: The ID of the user who last set the purpose.

last_set.description: The timestamp when the purpose was last set.

shared_team_ids.description: The IDs of teams with which the channel is shared.

previous_names.description: The previous names of the channel.

num_members.description: The number of members in the channel.

parent_conversation.description: The parent conversation of the channel.

pending_connected_team_ids.description: The IDs of teams that are pending to be connected to the channel.

items.description: List of pending connected team IDs.
